description: Try our easy to follow Pear, Apple & Cinnamon Crumble recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear, Apple & Cinnamon Crumble Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place in a preheated oven, 200°C, Gas Mark 6, for 20-25 minutes until golden and bubbling. Serve with crème fraîche or cream.
